titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2738) to implement the United States-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2739) to implement the United States-Singapore Free Trade Agreement.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-229, by Mr. Dreier.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2738 and H.R. 2739 with 2 hours of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 93.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 329.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 200 (Roll no. 413).
Mr. Hastings (FL) moved to table motion to reconsider ordering previous question.
On motion to table motion to reconsider Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 201 (Roll no. 414).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 281 - 144 (Roll no. 415).

action.text: Mr. Hastings (FL) moved to reconsider adoption of the resolution.
Mr. Dreier moved to table the motion to reconsider adoption of the resolution
On motion to table the motion to reconsider adoption of the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 197 (Roll no. 416).
Motion to reconsider adoption of the resolution tabled.

bill.summary: 7/23/2003--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2738 (United States-Chile Free Trade Agreement Implementation Act) and H.R. 2739 (United States-Singapore Free Trade Agreement Implementation Act).
